page.title: 12BREAKDANCING
page.content: In 1980's the most popular dance craze is breakdance.Moonwalk,caterpillar and turtle balance are probably the most popular moves. The{moonwalk}is just sliding backwards like on rollerskates.The {caterpillar}is done by laying on your stomach and throwing your legs in the air then roll down smoothly.The{turtle is where you balance on your hands. The{helicopter}is where you hop from shoulder to shoulder spinning at the same time.The{windmill}is like it but you get a lot lower..A{headspin}is when you spin on your head.A{handspin is a one handed turtle spinning around.A{kneespin}is where you bend your leg and spin on your knee. The craze is most popular with boys between nine and eighteen.Very few girls breakdance.A number of people breakdancing together is a crew
